about_the_game:
Incredible arts specially designed to convey tranquility and make you delight in watching our kittens.

Let the desktop of your computer with a unique look!

There are 6 images with 3840 x 2160 pixels and Ultra Wide (2560 x 1080 pixels).

After downloading this add-on will be available in the directory where the game “Hidden Shapes Lovely Cats” is installed, by default, it is (...\Steam\steamapps\common\ Hidden Shapes Lovely Cats \ Hidden Shapes Lovely Cats - Wallpapers).
